answers.answer: Hello Tammy,Have you told your doctor these symptoms? The burning could be related to diabetes or poor circulation as can the swelling? Have you had a blood lipid panel drawn lately. I would certainly get this matter checked if you haven't.

question: At 79 I am in reasonable health,but do take chronic medication.My main problem is the foot pain I get from walking,and the burning sensation,in my feet,even when wearing nothing on my feet at home.My feet are also painful,when just sitting doing nothing.There also is a numbness from the calf down,in both legs.Also on occasions my ankles swell up.  regards TammyKellyLucy
title: My feet are very sore,making walking a problem.
